nome: Aru Asa Dummy Head Mic ni Natteita Ore-kun no Jinsei

metadata_completo.titulo_oficial: Aru Asa Dummy Head Mic ni Natteita Ore-kun no Jinsei
metadata_completo.titulo_ingles: My Life After I Became a Dummy Head Mic One Morning
metadata_completo.sinopse:
After reincarnating into a dummy head microphone, the protagonist gets involved in the lives of high school girls who do ASMR. The comedic anime will follow these high schoolers as they aim for the ASMR Koshien.

(Source: MAL News)
